title: News reports from France. [No. 70?/16] = Chroniques de France
creator_contributor_role: La Societe Nouvelle Pathe-Cinema, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/France - Social conditions
description: French cinemagazine items:  1. A century of the restoration of historical monuments - about Prosper Merimee who, as Inspector General of French Historical Monuments began the work of restoring France's historical buildings and monuments. 2. The audiovisual era - a science fair showing new audiovisual techniques and machines such as a multiple choice machine for exams and one for teaching dentistry. 3. Trade Unionism in France - shows the history of trade unionism in France and the cooperation between unions, management and the government. Shows how it works in the Renault factory.
